You have a good hand and Hearts is your longest suit, so yuo open 1H.|mb|P|an|Not a great hand|mb|2H|an|Partner likes Hearts|at|Your partner likes Hearts and tells you that by raising to 2H. |mb|P|an|Not a great hand|mb|P|an|No reason to go any higher (yet!)|mb|P|pc|DK|nt|They lead the King of Diamonds against your 2H contract. |pc|D2|pc|D6|pc|DA|at|You can win the lead, |pc|H2|at|and lead some trumps, |pc|H5|pc|HK|at|trying to win. |pc|H7|pc|H3|at|Lead another Heart, |pc|HQ|pc|HA|at|and win that one as well. |pc|HJ|pc|SA|nt|The opponents have no Hearts left, so you can play Spade winners. |pc|S2|pc|S3|pc|S8|pc|S6|pc|ST|pc|SK|pc|S9|pc|SQ|pc|SJ|pc|S7|pc|S4|pc|S5|pc|D7|pc|D5|pc|D9|pc|D3|pc|D8|pc|DT|pc|DQ|pc|DJ|pc|D4|pc|C2|pc|H4|pc|CQ|pc|CK|pc|C5|pc|C3|pc|C4|pc|CJ|pc|CA|pc|CT|pc|C7|pc|H6|pc|C6|pc|H8|pc|H9|pc|C9|pc|HT|pc|C8|
